Description: Carvin DC150 Double Cutaway Right Handed Tobacco Sunburst Quilt Guitar w/ Case Carvin DC150 Double Cutaway Right Handed Tobacco Sunburst Quilt Guitar w/ Case Click images to enlarge Description Welcome to Our-Great-Goods! Carvin DC150 Double Cutaway Right Handed - Tobacco Sunburst Quilt - Guitar w/ Case In very nice used condition!! Carvin DC150 Double Cutaway Right Handed - Tobacco Sunburst Quilt - Guitar w/ Case Double cutaway mahogany body, through-body mahogany neck, 22-fret ebony fingerboard with dot inlays, sperzel locking tuners, tune-o-matic bridge/stop tailpiece, three-per-side tuners, gold hardware, two Carvin C22 humbuckers, volume/tone controls, three-position switch, two mini coil splitting switches. Product Specs: Brand: Carvin Model: DC150 Deterity: Right Handed Finish: Tobacco Sunburst Quilt Hardward: Gold Categories: Solid Body Made In: United States This was identified from searching pictures on the internet, finally found the exact one and took specs from that description. I really couldn't find anything wrong with this guitar, no obvious knicks or scratches, tiny ones maybe but overall it's in excellent shape, case on the outside has scuffs but overall a nice set. Includes Carvin case, key and truss rod tool. I Have Attempted to Photograph and Describe Any and All Imperfections But May Have Missed a Few!
